summary: A powerful portrait of the leaders of the reggae music Movement, and how Reggae has become a worldwide phenomenon. The film showcases performances by the best Reggae and Dance Hall artists ever assembled.
cast: Brick and Lace|Capleton|Stephen 'Cat' Coore|Joseph Current|Lowell 'Sly' Dunbar|Elephant Man|Beresford Hammond|Toots Hibbert|Gregory Isaacs|Vybz Kartel|Bounty Killer|Alaine Laughton|Dr. Marshall|Lady Saw|Robbie Shakespeare|Tanya Stephens|Third World|Bunny Wailer
title: Made in Jamaica
